text: لا تجـروا۟ اليوم انكم منا لا تنصرون

translations.translation: 'Do not pray fervently today. You will not get any help from Us.
Do not supplicate for help today; you will not be rescued by Us;
Put a stop to your groaning now! Surely no help shall be provided to you from Us.
We shall tell them, "Do not cry for help on this day; you will receive none from Us".
“Do not implore this day; you will not be helped by Us.”
Invoke not loudly this day! Certainly you shall not be helped by Us.
Cry not for succor this day; surely you shall not be given help from Us.
Groan not today; surely you shall not be helped from Us.
Supplicate not this day! Assuredly ye will not be helped by Us.
Do not cry out for help this day, for surely you shall not be helped by Us.
Implore not to-day; verily ye from Us are not to be succoured.
‘Do not make entreaties today! Indeed, you will not receive any help from Us.
(It will be said): "Groan not in supplication this day: for ye shall certainly not be helped by Us.
Invoke not loudly this day! Certainly, you shall not be helped by Us.
(We shall say): 'Do not groan today, surely you shall receive no help from Us'
Do not groan today. You will receive no help from Us.
Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
[23:65] ‘Do not supplicate [out loud] on this day! Truly you will not receive help, you will not be protected, against Us.
Say to them, Muhammad: (Supplicate not this day) to escape Our punishment! (Assuredly you will not be helped) you will not be saved (by Us) from Our punishment.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: لذلك يقال لهم طرداً ورداً: { لاَ تَجْأَرُواْ } أيها المسرفون ولا تستنصروا { ٱلْيَوْمَ } منا حين نزول { إِنَّكُمْ } العذاب بسبب غفلتكم عنا، وإنكاركم علينا في يوم الراحة والرخاء { مِّنَّا لاَ تُنصَرُونَ } [المؤمنون: 65] أصلاً، فاليوم لا ينفعكم دعاؤكم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: فيقال لهم: { لا تجأروا اليوم } فإن الجؤار غيرُ نافع لكم، { إنكم منا لا تُنصرون } أي: لا يلحقكم من جهتنا نصرة تمنعكم مما دهمكم
